Third Wire

Got info on Third Wire?
Third Wire logo
Established: 1999

Software Highlights from Credited Titles

Third Wire's first work that SPOnG is aware of is the 1996 title, "AH-64D Longbow Flash Point Korea" (PC).

The company has been involved titles released on the PC.

The company's most recent involvement was on the 2003 release "Strike Fighters Project 1" (PC).

Know something we don't? Let us know! If you work for Third Wire, register now to manage this listing.

Related News & Nibbles

Playing Catch-up is a podcast about games. Yes, another one.

Hosts Tom Bailey and Chris Davies (and, formerly, Tim Owen) have shelves (and hard drives) full of old games they haven’t managed to get to yet. In order to rectify this, they pick a game from each other’s list each week for the other to go away and play. A week later, they come back and discuss their ‘homework’ before picking next week’s games.

Oh, and they record it for your listening pleasure. Quite the treat, I’m sure you’ll agree.

This site is basic, we realise. It’s early days for the pod and we’ll spruce this place up once we’re properly up and running. For now, we just hope you enjoy the show. If so, please feel free to say hello (or tell us how we could be doing things better) here:

Twitter: @catchuppod
Email: hello@playingcatchup.co.uk

We’re developing the world’s most advanced and versatile chess platform




Together with renowned chess grandmasters, educational experts and IT specialists we’re developing intuitive learning pathways for children, rapid learning strategies for recreational players and challenging lessons for advanced chess enthusiasts. That’s supplemented with an extensive range of news and entertainment to create an unparalleled learning experience for our users.

Welcome to UnrealSP.org

We are a community dedicated to supporting the single player adventures available for Unreal, Epic Games' blockbusting 1998 first-person shooter. UnrealSP.org is home to players and modders who strive to maintain, improve and build upon Unreal's unique game design as well as the numerous custom-made single player campaigns created for it and its sequel games.

Start browsing by reading our articles, find interesting custom maps on our review listing, check out upcoming modding projects and say hello in our discussion forums.

Games Lab

Purpose of Lab

In the past decades computer and console games have become increasingly important receiving an enormous amount of media exposure. In the meantime there is a huge variety of games on offer.

The Games Lab at the Faculty of Digital Media provides the facilities necessary to develop computer and console games. In the games lab all aspects of games development from the first idea to the realization can be experimented with and applied at the theoretical and applied level. These include game design, hardware development, graphic design and story development. The games lab offers excellent facilities for project work, research projects and thesis work in the area of computer and console games.

Lab Equipment

  • Whiteboards and metaplan walls
  • Many items for tinkering
  • Passive stereo projector
  • 5.1 surround sound system
  • Gaming PC
  • Wii U
  • 2 * Xbox + Kinect
  • Kinect for Windows
  • Playstation + Move
  • Ouya
  • 2 * Oculust Rift
  • Touch table
  • Emotiv Brain2Computer interface
  • Standard data projectors
  • Various tablets
  • Leap Motion sensor
  • Various games for different platforms
  • X6 single player simulator
  • 2 gaming laptops
  • Macbook Pro
  • Nintendo Switch



L 2.09 Furtwangen

Hi! We're an iPhone and iPad game developer called Tap4Fun. We make online mmo strategy games like Galaxy Legend. Check out our games or read more about us.

Some of our Features

Here's what you can expect with each Tap4Fun game.

View all our Features
  • Online Worlds

    We're committed to online experiences that people from around the world can share. It's a big world and we aim to make it smaller.

  • Regular Updates

    We believe in standing by our products and the players who support them, so we offer regular and free updates to all of our games.

  • Universal Apps

    Every Tap4Fun game is available on iPhone and iPad for free, so there's never a need to download an "HD version". All in one.

Some of our Blog Posts

See what we're up to in our latest Tap4Fun blog posts.

View all our blog posts
  • Welcome to Star Warriors!


    A new Tap4Fun game Star Warriors is about to 1st Closed Test. The test will begin on 2016-07-30 at 11:00:00 UTC. In order to pave the way for your interstellar journey, we have specially prepared 7-day closed test packages for all commanders.

  • Introducing Hero’s Path

    Hero's Path

    A new Tap4Fun game is about to enter the fray! We welcome Hero’s Path, an upcoming online strategy game with real-time combat elements, to the Tap4Fun family.

  • Galaxy Legend Updating with New Artwork

    网页_01 2

    Galaxy Legend will be updating soon with brand new artwork and improvements to gameplay. Check out these previews of new starships, characters, weapons, and effects to get an idea of what to expect.
